name: Kitchen Defense
description:
Kitchen Defense is a tower defense where vegetables must defend the kitchen against an attack of sausages. It has been made by Valentin Daguenet, Sarah Lepreux, Soufiane Lasri, Mathis Biabiany and Madjid Taha during the BBQ Game Jam by COIN in Metz.

The source are available here :

https://github.com/vdaguenet/bbq-gamejam/
